content: You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Giovanni., Giovanni just said to you: '"Ah, thanks Marco! Much appreciated."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome, Giovanni! Glad to help."

You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Giovanni., Giovanni just said to you: '"Ah, perfetto, Marco! Grazie mille for that. Much appreciated."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Giovanni! My pleasure. Glad to help."
